Source code for Playground.Python_Staff.OOP.Property_

[docs]class newprops:

    def __init__(self):
        self._age =40


[docs]    def getage(self):
        return self._age



[docs]    def setage(self,value):
        print("Set age: ",value)
        self._age= value


    age = property(getage,setage,None,None)



if __name__ == '__main__':

    x = newprops()
    print(x.age)
    x.age = 2
    print(x.age)
